extendedInfo.description: Four in Line is a very captivating puzzle game. Be the first one to connect four disks in a vertical, horizontal or diagonal line and you win the game. The AI is quite a strong one so you have to design tricky strategies to win the game.â â â  FEATURES â â â â strong AI designâ intuitive interfaceâ â â  TIPS â â â â Tap the column in which you want to drop your disk to select it.â Tap the selected column to drop the disk.â The disk will fall until it reaches an occupied position.â The first to connect 4 disks on a vertical, horizontal or diagonal line wins the game.â The game will end and start again either if you win, lose or draw.â If neither you nor the AI connects 4 disks while the board is not full the game ends in a draw.â To restart the game press -New Game- from inside the main menu.â To adjust the sound volume use the volume slider in the main menu.â To turn the sound on and off press on the -speaker- symbol in the main menu.â To pause the game just enter the main menu.In order to keep the app 100% free, you will receive the following âSearch shortcut icon on your home screen,Search shortcut on your bookmarks and browser homepage.This will help us bring you more cool apps like this in the future.You can delete the search shortcuts easily (Drag & Drop to the garbage), this will not affect the application in any way.NOTE: This game requires additional libraries. Nothing to worry about ! A service called Ministro will download the necessary Qt libraries  (20MB)  and install them for you.
